about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Raining Blobs composed by BJ Derganc and a bonus track by Bjulin plus wallpapers of all stages.

BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 01 Break Through
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 02 Easy Peasy
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 03 Connect the Blobs
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 04 Flight
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 05 Indiscretions
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 06 Smooth Dance
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 07 Chill Out
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 08 Midnight Chase
BJ Derganc - Raining Blobs - 09 Autumn Moon
Bjulin - Raining Blobs - 10 Dancing Squirrels
